    • enable

      public void enable()
      Description copied from interface: Module
      Enables this module.

      This method is called when the module should start its functionality. Any initialization or resource allocation should be performed here.

    • disable

      public void disable()
      Description copied from interface: Module
      Disables this module.

      This method is called when the module should stop its functionality. Any cleanup or resource deallocation should be performed here.

      Specified by:

    • reload

      public void reload()
      Description copied from interface: Module
      Reloads this module.

      This method is called when the module should refresh its state or configuration. Typically involves disabling and then re-enabling with updated parameters.

      Specified by:
      reload in interface Module
